game.board

Class BoardInitialization

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.board.BoardInitialization

  • public class BoardInitialization
extends java.lang.Object
    Initializes the hexes on the game Board.
    Author:
    Cornelia Sedlmeir-Hofmann, Paula Wikidal, Christoph Hermann
    See Also:
    Hex, Board
